body.p: The objective of this Standard is to prescribe the accounting and disclosure for employee benefits. The Standard requires an entity to recognise:

li.p: a liability when an employee has provided service in exchange for employee benefits to be paid in the future; and
an expense when the entity consumes the economic benefit arising from service provided by an employee in exchange for employee benefits.
